name: Annodata
description:
Annodata is an independent company specialising in the provision of ICT and Print technology Managed Services.  Over three decades we have helped companies drive efficiencies and reduce costs, ensuring our tailored solutions always address specific business challenges and needs.  Annodata also has the reach and capability to provide a fully integrated Unified Communications approach.  We understand the importance of unifying different communication platforms, devices, applications and process
es.
